DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect acetyl-L-carnitine treatment Perceived Work Stress , Work Ability Work Performance subject Hepatic Encephalopathy .
DOC.brief_title: Acetyl-L-Carnitine Reduces Perceived Work Stress Improves Work Ability Work Performance Hepatic Encephalopathy
DOC.criteria: overt hepatic encephalopathy ( HE ) history overt HE history recent alcohol intake ; infection ; recent antibiotic use gastrointestinal bleeding ; history recent use drug affect psychometric performance like benzodiazepine , antiepileptic psychotropic drug ; history shunt surgery transjugular intrahepatic portosystemic shunt portal hypertension ; electrolyte imbalance ; renal impairment ; hepatocellular carcinoma ; severe medical problem congestive heart failure , pulmonary disease neurological psychiatric disorder could influence quality life measurement ; inability perform neuropsycological test .
